website_summaries.verdict: Stylish yet simple in design with a seat belt to protect the precious cargo.
pros: One of the few strollers that utilizes denim, appealing highly to those who are already overloaded with conventional colors and patterns
Arrives with a buckle that will secure dolls in place, and perhaps saving you some time from chasing around missing dolls
cons: While we love that it's lightweight, it is not heavy enough for outdoor use

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My child has tried to destroy this several times unsuccessfully.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kastelein

customer_reviews.title: I think it is a great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month old daughter just loves this carriage. She piles in her toys and pushes them all around the house. It took her few tries to get used to. She kept leaning too hard and the carriage would fall on its back or she would be running with it and trip over her feet, but now she has the hang of it and loves it. I think it is a great buy for the money. Safe. Locks into unfolded position well. Easy to close (we tend to leave it open all the time). Nowhere she can catch her fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Charise

customer_reviews.title: 16 Month Old Grandson Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month old grandson likes to push his real umbrella stroller around, but it's too big to easily push it through the house, so I got this one for him. He puts a few cars in it and happily pushes them all over the place! It only keeps him occupied for a few minutes at a time, but he goes back to it repeatedly. (I don't object to pink for a boy, but I thought the pink ones were a bit too garish. This denim with a pink heart is perfect.)
customer_reviews.author: T.L.R.

customer_reviews.title: Best toy stroller out there
customer_reviews.text: My 5-yr-old loves this! We'd gone through TWO of the cheapo strollers from Walmart/dollar store, and I decided to get something that would last at least until she outgrew/stopped playing with it. I chose this one for her birthday because it was out of the norm of the crazy bright/pink girls' everything that you normally find. This stroller is super-cute! It has a locking mechanism when set up, which is nice to keep it from collapsing during use, but the kids can't fold it up themselves -- but fine for us, we just leave it open, as she uses it almost every day. It's very sturdy, excellent product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Adel Zeller

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great product!
customer_reviews.text: Since having a new baby, my almost 3 year old son has wanted to play with his doll that he previously ignored. He started pushing the doll around in his toy grill (it has wheels) so I decided to just get him a doll stroller. I almost bought a different one, but the reviews weren't so great. This one was worth the extra $5 or so. It's very sturdy and it's held up to lots of racing around the house. It folds up just like a real stroller, which is nice. I'd definitely recommend this stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Emi

customer_reviews.title: Fabric removable/very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I do like how sturdy it seems to be. It’s for my son and he races it up and downs the driveway like a maniac! My only thing is that the fabric isn’t attached to the stroller(separates from top and bottom) and it comes undone quite a lot and my son isn’t coordinated enough to put it back on so I’m fixing it a lot. Sort of annoying. I’m sure other people might like it because it’s washable but i wish it would just stay on. Other than that we love it!
customer_reviews.author: rachmse

customer_reviews.title: Blue stroller is Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law made me buy this one. Because the little guy, 23 months old, was pushing around his cousin's baby stroller which is pink. Momma didn't like that. So, I bought this for Baby G. She's happy. He's happy. Baby doll Mickey Mouse likes the blue one better too. So does Kitty, Puppy, and baby doll in blue PJ's. Life is good. Now I'm allowed to take him outside with the blue baby doll stroller. 😊 Happiness at last!
customer_reviews.author: E M L

customer_reviews.title: Great little stroller
customer_reviews.text: Going on a year with this cute and cheap stroller. It folds up easily with the help of Mommy, and it can even hold a sibling every once in awhile! This stroller gets a LOT of use in our 4-child household, and it still looks brand new. I have faith it will be with us for the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Sam & Alex

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stroller
customer_reviews.text: I like that this stroller isn’t bright flippin’ pink. It seems to be made well and is holding up to my toddler running it all over the house like a maniac. Loses a star since the cloth seat comes off of the bottom bars pretty easily. It’s simple enough to slip back on but it’s annoying to have to do it every ten minutes since my kid likes to take it off. I might get my hot glue gun out to see if I can make it stay for awhile longer.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sundberg

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter’s 2 year birthday. She loves it! She constantly asks to take her babies for a walk. My son likes to steal it from her and push his puppies all over the house. Seems pretty sturdy. My kids are quite destructive and this thing has taken their combined forces. The seat does get pulled off frequently and I have to fix it but it’s not really a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Watson

customer_reviews.title: No Sitting in the Doll Stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller, it's very sturdy. We all know that our toddlers are going to sit in it while they play from time to time, so the fact that it is sturdy is a huge plus. My only complaint is that when my toddler did sit in it the fabric part broke off. I'm not going to give a low rating for that though because this is a doll stroller, and it wasn't made for a child to sit in, but if your child is like mine they will sit in it and the fabric will probably break off.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Let no-lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these strollers that we bought and we love it. We got one almost two years ago for my then 2 yr-old. Now my nest toddler has one as well (they both live it so much). Every other stroller like this I’ve seen at friends’ house has ripped seat. These are still going strong and are super durable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! My grandson stacks his dinosaurs in the stroller to go for walks. He sits in it occasionally when he's playing and it holds up well. We have had it for about a year and it still looks new. Perfect for boys or girls.
customer_reviews.author: Bussa's GaGa

customer_reviews.title: Nice stroller for a doll for my 18 months girl
customer_reviews.text: Nice stroller for a doll for my 18 months girl. She love playing with it. I Love the design, the color and the price. The only down side is that the fabric sometime came off "the frame" of the strolles and we neet to fix it back in place.. Otherwise I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Heni

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It Seems sturdy and rolls nicely. Negative is that my 21-month granddaughter wants to sit in it herself so had to order a Toddler umbrella stroller which I’ll have soon.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your dolly companion
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this thing (she's 2) and pushes her baby dolly around everywhere in it! It's held up for an entire year now and going strong! Perfect height for the 2 year old, yet my 6 year old boys enjoy running races with it too. Hands down one of their favorite toys! It's a plus that it folds down so easily! Love the simple design of chambray-ish fabric with the heart. Love the simplicity
customer_reviews.author: Buttered Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves this toy
customer_reviews.text: My 21 month loves to push his stuffed animals around in this. This is usually the first toy he goes for in the morning. He slams it around, throws it over baby gates, etc and so far it seems very durable. We also take it on short walks- Keeps him focused and we get to our destination a little faster. He loves to use it on the playground too and the wheels are pretty easy to clean when we come back inside. Great toy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Luisana Victorica

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and perfect size for toddler
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this to push her little dolls around!! And I like the design because it's not super bright and loud (like most toys). The only thing I'd warn to parents is that if your child is just learning to walk, this is a little tough to use. There are no breaks so if they're used to something that has a little bit of resistant (e.g., the vtech walker), monitor them. The front wheels can flip up. Overall, absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.author: Malia Baxter

customer_reviews.title: A big hit with my 1.5 year old!
customer_reviews.text: A big hit with my 1.5 year old! She pushed a pile of babies around the house forever. Careful that your kid doesn't sit in it though... it's tempting. She didn't break it or fall out, but it definitely could happen.
customer_reviews.author: HBP

customer_reviews.title: 1.5 year old LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: This was a total hit with my 1.5 year old niece. She's really into her dolls (feeds them, cuddles, and mothers them) so I figured she'd love pushing them in a stroller. Her parents kept saying that it was the perfect Christmas present! Yay! The older kids (ages 2.5 and 3) also love playing with it. Something to keep in mind, however, is that it does make a lot of noise when the kids push it up and down the hall (we have wood floors).
customer_reviews.author: Spubu

customer_reviews.title: Well made stroller for dolls.
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled when this arrived. It is very well made, locks open , and rolls easily. The seat is made out of material, NOT plastic like the cheaper ones are. I'm happy that I paid more for this, it was SO worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CB in Nh

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easily to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great especially for the price. Easy to remove the fabric for cleaning and pretty sturdy. 3 year old has had it for 6 months and it’s holding up well
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars if it had a secure attachment to the arms at the top of the back. it is held by elastic which I'm sure will stretch. and to have a snap buckle for the dolls my toddler is having trouble using the loop strap to tighten them in. all in all its a good product and I would recommend this item to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ian B.

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed
customer_reviews.text: My preschoolers love it! It works well for little hands to move around and practice taking care of a little baby
customer_reviews.author: Mathtchrj

customer_reviews.title: and my toddlers love pushing their dolls and each other around in it
customer_reviews.text: Cute, and my toddlers love pushing their dolls and each other around in it. I just wish the fabric would attach to the bottom of the frame a little more securely. I'm constantly having to fix it for them after it gets handled roughly, which is pretty much the only way my two year olds handle anything. But I'm not too upset as you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Morin

customer_reviews.title: Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who has a baby doll that he needs to take everywhere. I want one that was not all pink. We have had this for a month now and it is holding up great so far.
customer_reviews.author: MelP

customer_reviews.title: This is a great stroller. It is more expensive than our last ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stroller. It is more expensive than our last stroller, however it is bigger and sturdier and seems like it is better quality overall. I believe that it was worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Great little stroller.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it. She is 20 months and it is the perfect size and weight. She can maneuver it easily and can see over the top. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a stroller for my son to push his toys around (he'd been pushing various chairs and tables and getting frustrated when
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were looking for! I wanted a stroller for my son to push his toys around (he'd been pushing various chairs and tables and getting frustrated when they got stuck) and this is great since it isn't all pink like so many other ones. It folds down really well and he has a blast pushing his toys around in it. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyGF

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is great for a two year old. It's sturdy & entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bosque

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for price.
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about this stroller. There doesn't seem much point paying more money than this for something that has this function. My daughter used it all summer to give her dolls and stuffed animals a walk. I like that it's not too girly, especially when there is a doll in it and you can't see the heart.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tall Ones!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old loves it. She's tall, so it's at a nice height for her. The handles of other push toys were kind of low for her, but these are perfect. She pushes it all around the house, putting her dolls and stuffed animals inside. Nothing has broken or ripped. It folds and unfolds easily as well. And it's not pink! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... (especially for these types of toys that the BOYS LOVE to play with - we want them to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I am always looking for non-pink items for my daycare (especially for these types of toys that the BOYS LOVE to play with - we want them to be caring fathers!) and was happy to find this stroller since I can't find them any longer at local stores without being all pink. I was disappointed at the big pink heart, but a red sharpie changed that!!
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Good basic stroller
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a toddler who wants to take his/her dolls and plush animals on walks. It is a little light weight, and has only been used in the house, but has provided many hours of play.
customer_reviews.author: JCB

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Not the most sturdy, but it won't fall apart and it's perfect for him (2yo) to push inside or out.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Two year old's favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter's second birthday and she loves it! Her grandma has a similar one at her house that she has been using since about 14 months and we had to get another for our house! She pushes her dolls and stuffed animals everywhere. I like that it's not an obnoxious overly girly color and the wheels don't scratch my hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Park

customer_reviews.title: this is a nice toy stroller
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a nice toy stroller. The fold function is handy and it's the perfect size and weight for my 18 month old. My one complaint is that the waist strap doesn't have a real buckle, so I'm going to add one. My son loves buckles!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a two year-old
customer_reviews.text: My two year old granddaughter loves this little stroller. It is lightweight and stable
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 18 month old niece and she absolutely loves it! Perfect size, good lightweight quality. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Two year old granddaughter loves it! I like the simple color (navy) and sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stroller over others because it had a tasteful design. The stroller turned out to be more popular with my toddler than I thought and it's still going strong. It's lightweight and easy for her to pick up and move on her own. The stroller does fold up - though it did take a minute to initially figure out - which is great when my daughter doesn't feel like walking it back from the playground.
customer_reviews.author: rcny

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is so cute, but I was worried about the quality of the stroller. It comes in a cheap plastic bag. But after having it for a month with daily use, I Love it. No damage to it at all so far. It's perfect for my 3 year old & the denim look with the pink heart makes it look sooo pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Naycee_3

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is loving her stroller! This is the second one purchased from amaZon. The first broke the first day and was returned (it was a different brand). This one is great and holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter’a Favorite birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Pulled out of the box and set it up in two seconds. My daughter LOVES it. It was her favorite birthday present. She runs around with it all the time and it hasn’t broken or bent yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute stroller. Perfect for my 2 year old daughter. It holds her baby dolls and easy for her to maneuver around the house with. I do not fold it up so I cannot review on that. The only gripe I have is the bottom part of the "chair" keeps coming undone from the poles of the stroller and I have to fix it (easy to do) often which can be a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Torie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little doll stroller
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little doll stroller. Our son wants to play with every toy his older sister has, and there were mega tears over the baby stroller. So we bought him this inexpensive version hoping it would satisfy - and it does! Its nice b/c it isn't overly girly, and virtually indestructible. He plows this thing all over the apartment and rams the stoller into walls and doorways - no problem! It still looks like new. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Mangino

customer_reviews.title: Cute Strollers
customer_reviews.text: These strollers are very cute. The two little girls I bought them for love them. They are just the right height for a 2 and a 4 year old and are easy to push.
customer_reviews.author: Kim D

customer_reviews.title: Great little stroller
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy and my granddaughter (age 2.5) loved it for her new 12 inch baby doll. Like the simple design of a solid color with a heart. Came well packaged. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MJD

customer_reviews.title: It Was a Hit!
customer_reviews.text: This by far was the best gift I could have given my Granddaughter. She loved it from the very first moment and had it with her every moment she was awake. It is a beautiful stroller, very sturdy and well made, I see her playing with it for years to come. I've seen some that seem to be poorly made and flimsy, not the case with this one. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for the perfect children't gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mit

customer_reviews.title: This little stroller is very sturdy. The frame is metal and the seat is ...
customer_reviews.text: This little stroller is very sturdy. The frame is metal and the seat is a light denim material. My 2 year old loves pushing her little dolls around in it but also enjoys a ride herself from time to time. (When she can get her older brother to push her around in it) It has lasted unscathed through the months of use. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to drive, buckle stinks
customer_reviews.text: Light, moves easily without damaging walls if driven erratically by toddler. We (kids) don't like the buckle. They can't clip/unclip themselves so it stays closed and they slide babies in and out.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing baby stroller
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought a cheaper baby stroller which was junk and I ended up having to throw it away. This is a very well made, super cute stroller. My toddler loves it and I’m very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute baby doll stroller for your little ones.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it is as expected. It's really tiny, so good for about 4 yrs.and under I'd guess. It won't last long if they climb in it themselves so have that baby doll in it when you give it to your child. Love the denim and the heart,very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a little toddler
customer_reviews.text: perfect for a little toddler, very light weight. when my daughter first started walking, she would tip it over b/c she was used to leaning on the vtech walker she had, but she learned quickly how to adjust and now loves putting any and everything in that stroller to do laps in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: jingelso

customer_reviews.title: it's a little annoying.
customer_reviews.text: really cute and different, not the "all pink" stroller that most girls have. I agree with the issue that another buyer describes the fabric not being fastened to the metal parts of the stroller, it's a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Moe_Lluna

customer_reviews.title: Not made of cheap plastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Even the 5 yo brother likes pushing the stroller! And opening & closing it! But the 2 yo puts baby in it & off she goes!
customer_reviews.author: Dee S

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: My 1.5 yr old and all her friends are obsessed with this doll stroller. She loves stacking all her stuffed animals in it and taking it outside "like mama" does with the big stroller. The only hard part is keeping my kid out of it. I'm afraid it will collapse under her weight.
customer_reviews.author: clumsy one

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 2-year-old's birthday, and she loves it. It has been 6 months since she first received this stroller, and she still uses it often. For the first several months, she wanted to take it with us in the car and push her baby doll around wherever we went. For the price, it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it. Only problem was she kept wanting to ...
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it. Only problem was she kept wanting to ride in it herself!
customer_reviews.author: sherie woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Great baby animal stroller
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and has held up well for my 3 year old. Folds up pretty easy, but could pinch fingers if you aren’t careful.
customer_reviews.author: bigs024

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun stroller for any kid to take a fun stroll with their doll
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter absolutely loves this stroller. She is always finding different dolls to put in and go on walks with. From the backyard to the front or around the neighborhood this stroller has held up very well. Through puddles and mud it has cleaned up well too. This is a great affordable buy for all the kids who want to take their dolls for a stroll.
customer_reviews.author: M. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: it's cute.  it's durable.  it's not a million shades of pink!  YAY!
customer_reviews.text: we got this stroller after looking for an option that wasn't completely pink and are beyond delighted. this stroller is very durable (see toddler attempting to sit in it occasionally or pile it high with stuff from around the house), rolls really nicely, and most importantly, my kid LOVES it. super great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: I'm not super into the baby doll thing but my daughter is
customer_reviews.text: I'm not super into the baby doll thing but my daughter is. She really wanted a stroller and I was looking for a small one for a 14" doll, this is great size. Also didn't want something pink. So thanks for this design... person who designed it. I love the heart and the blue is easy on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: AmberJane

customer_reviews.title: Cute design, rattles a bit.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes to play with this. I purchased it, because I liked the denim fabric. It rattles a bit and the fabric has torn since my purchase. It collapses nicely with a safety mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Schwindt

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. Gave it as a gift to a 1yr old and she LOVED it. It's well made and really cute in person. This was the hit of the party! She opened then then cared about nothing else! So happy with this purchase. I love the deniem look with the hot pink heart. Still very girly without overdoing it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wee stroller, unexpectedly adored
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but sturdy, adorable but not frilly, and one of my kid's all-time favorite objects. Collapses easily to fit under a real stroller, easy to clean, and light enough not to make dents in the floor or furniture. My kid fills it with books, toys, and snacks and pushes it everywhere—still a favorite after months of playing. Couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kissane

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy doll stroller
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my granddaughter. She loves it and it looks well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: K1M3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for 20 month old toddler
customer_reviews.text: This toy stroller is well built. I bought it for my 20 month old granddaughter and she loves it. It is easy for her to use and withstands the tough use of a toddler (she even sat in it herself at one point!). I would highly recommend this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: anne gray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this stroller as a Christmas gift for my cousins baby. She loved it! Only 1 years old and she was running all over the house with it. She even sat in it her self a few times, a very cute site to see. I was also able to her help sit three of her dolls (one which was rather large) in the stroller at once. A great product, Definitely something I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deja cobb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 18 month old to push around her Bitty Baby. Perfect size! Instead, she and brother (almost 4 years old) take turns pushing each other around the house. So far it's held up! Though the elastic holding the seat to the top of the handle looks to snap any second while they're sitting....
customer_reviews.author: A Scors

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not majorly better than the less expensive ones ...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but not majorly better than the less expensive ones you can buy at Toys R Us. It's held up well so far though.
customer_reviews.author: K. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly what it says and my daughter loves it. I agree with other customers that denim seating tends to come off easily- but can be put back on just as easily. Strong build and even with her rough playing and pushing still in great condition
customer_reviews.author: Zoee7803

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: We really loved this kore gender neutral design, but my preschool age boys have already broken a wheel off. I know they were playing rough, but I’m disappointed that it snapped off. For the price, I thought it would hold up better than the $10 Walmart version.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A Haddox

customer_reviews.title: Tall and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the tallest doll strollers I could fine. It is loves and enjoyed by our 1, 2, and 3 year olds. Material seems sturdy. Held up just fine when the toddlers tried it out for their own little bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: really sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it. It has been pushed around the park and all over the house.....a whole lot - light weight, really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Merle Mceldowney

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it is a great stroller.
customer_reviews.text: Our stroller lacks one of the pins that hold the plastic handles in place so the handle was falling off before we fixed it. Also the fabric seat tends to slide off of the frame when my toddler tries to carry it around. Otherwise it is a great stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Kondratyeva

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: my daughter had one for her children and wanted to have one at my house.......
customer_reviews.author: Felh

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy for her to push around and put her dolls ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my niece. She loves this thing. Her parents got her a larger doll stroller but she prefers this one because of the size. It is very easy for her to push around and put her dolls in.
customer_reviews.author: Phil L

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made. My 18 month old granddaughter thought it was for her rather than her doll. She sits in it to watch her cartoons on TV, It is much more attractive that all the tacky pink floral ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: MB Trader

customer_reviews.title: Toddler’s favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: Our 2-year old son loves these little strollers, so I bought one more to keep in our apartment building’s shared playroom.
customer_reviews.author: JXM

customer_reviews.title: Higher quality than my real umbrella stroller
customer_reviews.text: This little stroller is a fantastic toy and is apparently better made than my real umbrella stroller. On my real stroller, I can't hang anything light from the handles without it tipping backwards. My daughter actually hung a bag of rocks from the handle of this toy stroller, and it's so well balanced that it didn't tip backwards like I thought it would. My daughters love it, and I like that it's not a shade of pepto pink or covered in glitter. Update: My girls play with this stroller nearly every day and it still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Skies

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks boyesh
customer_reviews.text: My grand son loves it, and best thing he won’t put anything and scoot until the belt is safely fastened.
customer_reviews.author: rimmy

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I love the color and it came assembled
customer_reviews.author: Mi Vill

customer_reviews.title: Cute little stroller
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 yo granddaughter opened this first at her birthday party and wouldn't open any other gifts! She loves pushing her stuffed monkey around the house, after securing him in via the safety strap, of course!
customer_reviews.author: Robin M. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty sturdy. Three 2 year old of varying weights have all test-driven each other in it and it's held up well so far!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael C.

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is simple and doesn't scream pink
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and uses it daily to push around her animals and baby doll. I like that it is simple and doesn't scream pink. However, it does feel flimsy and the wheels aren't very stable. I wonder about the lasting quality of this stroller, thus the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: simplemama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this stroller! Perfect size for a toddler (2yr) ! Easy to fold and storage too!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter seriously uses this every day! It's held up well to her constant use!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Cute design but seat is flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the stroller but the seat is not sturdy at all and falls off the frame very easily. I found a better one at Target for cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: awoo22

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: a gift for my youngest great grand daughter she is always pushing her doll or puppy around in it..
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Works but probally wont last long...
customer_reviews.text: Build quality could be better. Doubt it will hold up for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a three year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and value for money, slightly smaller than some others we have tried so she does not feel tempted to sit in it and possibly break it. That said, it feels more sturdy than some others we have tried for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Kadi Kriit

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and cute umbrella doll stroller
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old granddaughter loves her new doll stroller! Not big and bulky, just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 16 month great granddaughter! Fits her Bitty Baby perfectly and full size American dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Nice doll stroller
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this toy stroller. Good height for a toddler. Great color (not everything for girls should be pink).
customer_reviews.author: Natalya  S

customer_reviews.title: My daughter has loved this stroller
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has loved this stroller. It is a nice quality and the simple design. It has had a fair amount of use and it is still holding up very well. I would purchase this again if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and strong!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. So cute, my son loves it to push his stuffed dog around in. At this point, he even fits in it, and after all 32 lbs of him sitting in it, it's holding up. Good seams!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Durable little stroller
customer_reviews.text: Adorable stroller! We love that it isn't ALL pink like all other baby items. This has held up so well despite multiple children being caught sitting in it ;) I expected it to break much sooner with all the wear and tear, but its still going strong. Excellent little stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great play stroller! It is just like the real thing! (My 1.5 year old actually fits in it, to her 5 year old sister's delight.) it's lightweight, but very durable. All three kids love it. Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: It;s pretty easy to fold so we throw it under the stroller and take it to the park.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

product_meta.title: My First Umbrella Doll Stroller in Denim for Toddler
product_meta.description: This adorable doll stroller features a strong and durable built and offers and easy fold and go design. Makes for the perfect gift for the little girl or boy in your life. Buckle to hold doll secure. Easy fold and go. Strong Metal Frame.
feature_bullets: High quality and durable FOLD-ABLE umbrella doll stroller to carry up to 18" doll
Denim doll stroller with seat belt
Made of top quality. Double wheels on all 4 legs for extra stability.
Comes fully assembled. Super easy to fold and store
Approx Dimensions 16" length x 11" width x 22" height

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars422 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
